actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to permit individuals to deduct all expenses for their medical care.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow unlimited individual income tax deductions for the medical care expenses incurred for the taxpayer, his spouse and dependents, and certain senior citizens who do not qualify as dependents.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to permit individuals to deduct all expenses for their medical care.
